fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If your target uses an ability when you spot, you will use the same ability on the same intended player(s) instead. Charges and cooldowns still apply.
- Any visitors on your target visit you instead.
- At the start of the game, you are told the player you coach. The player you coach is told you are coaching them.
- At night, you and your target enter a private channel to discuss with each other.
- If your target dies, you die. If your target wins, you win. If your target leaves town, you leave town.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have your target achieve their goals.
